title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr Benllech Anglesey.
title.cy: Parti Cerdd Dant cangen Merched y Wawr Benllech, Rhanbarth Môn. Llangefni tua 1990.

description.en: Parti Cerdd Dant Cangen Benllech gyda Llio Loveluck yng nghyngerdd Merched y Wawr, Llangefni tua 1990.(blaen) Mair Jones, Mair Hughes, Bess Rowlands, Marian Lloyd, (cefn) Llio Loveluck, Bet Jones, Gwladys Parry, Eleri Jones, Mona Jones, Magdalen Jones, Mabel Roberts, Megan Jones, Madge Parry.
description.cy: Parti Cerdd Dant Cangen Benllech gyda Llio Loveluck yng nghyngerdd Merched y Wawr, Llangefni tua 1990.(blaen) Mair Jones, Mair Hughes, Bess Rowlands, Marian Lloyd, (cefn) Llio Loveluck, Bet Jones, Gwladys Parry, Eleri Jones, Mona Jones, Magdalen Jones, Mabel Roberts, Megan Jones, Madge Parry.
